name: Sunny Smiles

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Let me see what you got. Yeah, these'll do just fine. Just fine.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: Hey! Do that somewhere else.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: That safety better be on.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: What the hell? That's dangerous.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: Get down!

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'm in.
topics.response_text: Follow me. It's just down to the southeast a short ways.

topics.topic_text: [END TUTORIAL] I think I've learned enough.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. Hope this helped you some.

topics.topic_text: Sure, I'll come with you.
topics.response_text: Shouldn't take more than a couple minutes. Especially with two of us.

topics.topic_text: [END TUTORIAL] I've had enough of geckos for one day.
topics.response_text: I don't blame you. They're good eating, but that's about it.

topics.topic_text: I ran out of ammo.
topics.response_text: Yep, I'd say you're getting a little trigger happy there. Try to slow down a bit. Concentrate on hitting your target.

topics.topic_text: I wanted to ask you some questions.
topics.response_text: Well let's just finish this first, all right? Then we can talk. Preferably somewhere where I can get a stiff drink and Cheyenne can keep cool.

topics.topic_text: Couldn't hurt.
topics.response_text: All right, then. We'll need a couple ingredients to get started. Gonna want some Xander Root and a Broc Flower.{Neutral - not overly cheery.}

topics.topic_text: [END TUTORIAL] No need. I think I've got it covered from here.
topics.response_text: Okay, say no more.

topics.topic_text: [END TUTORIAL] I think I know what I need to know.
topics.response_text: {Sadly - her dog died}Okay. Well... good luck to you. I'm heading back to the Prospector. I could use a drink about now.

topics.topic_text: VCG02LastObjective
topics.response_text: Hey, do me a favor. Trudy - she's the bartender up at the Prospector, kind of the town mom - she likes to meet newcomers.{Neutral}

topics.topic_text: VCG02QuestTransition
topics.response_text: One more thing I wanted to show you.

topics.topic_text: What does the NCR keep you safe from?
topics.response_text: Well, the wildlife for one thing. Rowdy locals for another.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about the areas around Goodsprings.
topics.response_text: Sure. What did you want to know?

topics.topic_text: What other towns are nearby?
topics.response_text: Southeast of here is Primm - can't miss it, since it has this giant old rollercoaster right in the middle of town. The NCR's got an outpost there.

topics.topic_text: What kind of creatures are out there?
topics.response_text: Around here, mostly coyotes and geckos. The coyotes are pretty dangerous in large packs, but otherwise they're nothing to really worry about.

topics.topic_text: That's all I wanted to know. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: If you want to know anything else, just ask.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: I hunt geckos, mostly. The meat's pretty good and I can always find a buyer for the hides.

topics.topic_text: How many are there?
topics.response_text: At least six, Joe Cobb included. They look pretty mean.

topics.topic_text: Where's Trudy and the rest?
topics.response_text: They're getting set up in cover, but it might not go well unless we get out there soon.

topics.topic_text: Let's go.
topics.response_text: Oh, Easy Pete came through with the dynamite. Here's your supply. I really hope I don't blow myself up.

topics.topic_text: I wish I could've done more to save him.
topics.response_text: At least his death was quick. Cobb's gang had much worse in mind for him.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the other group?
topics.response_text: Got a funny name. Call themselves Caesar's Legion. Never seen 'em in these parts, so I couldn't tell you much.

topics.topic_text: NCR?
topics.response_text: The New California Republic. Bunch of settlers and soldiers coming in from the West, fixing on making Nevada their own.

topics.topic_text: Yes, terrible shame. Did you find anything of value on the Powder Gangers?
topics.response_text: Looting the bodies isn't a priority to me, but you go right on ahead.

topics.topic_text: We all knew what we were getting into.
topics.response_text: You're right, we did. I just wish things had turned out better.

topics.topic_text: I need to get to Primm. Can you suggest a route?
topics.response_text: Sure can. Take the road southeast out of town till it hits the freeway. Primm is the town with the roller coaster, straight south. Can't miss it.

topics.topic_text: Doc Mitchell said you could teach me to survive in the desert.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you. Sounds like you need all the help you can get after what they done to you.

topics.topic_text: I'm a little short on caps. I don't suppose there's any work available?
topics.response_text: Not in Goodsprings, no. But if you're up for a little scavenging, there's always the schoolhouse.

topics.topic_text: A magazine on locksmiths?
topics.response_text: If the lock's too much for you to handle, reading through the magazine might give you the edge you need.

topics.topic_text: What are the bobby pins for?
topics.response_text: You'll need those to pick the lock. Be careful, though - put too much pressure on them and they'll snap.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'll go take a look at that safe when I have a chance.
topics.response_text: Always happy to help someone down on their luck.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I already cracked that safe.
topics.response_text: Oh. Well, go ahead and keep the stuff I gave you, anyway. It'll be more useful to you than me.

topics.topic_text: Would Chet be willing to give us his supplies?
topics.response_text: {annoyed at Chet's selfishness}I don't think "give" is in Chet's vocabulary. Even with the town at stake, he'd still make you barter with him.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: I'll be waiting.

topics.topic_text: I'm going to help Ringo take on the powder gangers. I might need your help.
topics.response_text: Say no more. I'm in.

topics.topic_text: Well, that was easy.
topics.response_text: Joe Cobb talks about leaving us alone if we hand over Ringo, but I know his type. He and his friends will come after the town eventually.

topics.topic_text: Just like that?
topics.response_text: Just like that. I have a feeling that I'm going to end up fighting those guys one way or another, so I might as well get it over with.

topics.topic_text: We might die horribly. Well, maybe not me.
topics.response_text: That's inspiring. You might want to keep your optimism to yourself if you try to recruit anyone else.

topics.topic_text: Any ideas on how to convince Trudy to join us?
topics.response_text: A silver tongue would help. Convincing Trudy that we had a good plan to win the fight would also help.

topics.topic_text: How can I get Easy Pete's dynamite?
topics.response_text: Easy Pete's pretty protective of his dynamite. You'd have to convince him you know a thing or two about explosives before he handed it over.

conversation.response_text: Now, see those sarsaparilla bottles on that fence there? Take this and try to hit a couple of 'em.
That's the right idea. Look down the sight.

combat.response_text: What the hell were you thinking?
You won't get away with that.

description:
Sunny Smiles is a 32 year-old Hispanic Female.

A skilled survivalist and trapper who has made Goodsprings her home. Sunny is known throughout the small settlement for her exceptional marksmanship and her role in keeping the town safe from dangerous wildlife like geckos, radscorpions and coyotes. She provides food for the townsfolk by hunting and selling hides to Chet at the general store. While she cares for her community, Sunny prefers to stay out of the larger political conflicts of the Mojave Wasteland.

Sunny Smiles's Personality: Practical, independent, and community-minded. Sunny is straightforward and no-nonsense, valuing self-sufficiency and the safety of Goodsprings above all else. She avoids unnecessary conflict but is quick to defend her home when threatened. She maintains a neutral stance on the major factions of the Mojave, focusing instead on the immediate needs of her community.

Sunny Smiles's Backstory: Born in the post-apocalyptic Southwest, Sunny Smiles grew up learning essential survival skills from a young age. She eventually made her way to Goodsprings, recognizing the settlement's potential and the need for skilled hunters in the area. Having spent several years in the town, she has established herself as its primary protector, using her exceptional marksmanship to keep the community safe from the dangerous wildlife that surrounds them. While she has opportunities to leave for more prosperous areas, Sunny has chosen to remain in Goodsprings, content with the simple life and the important role she plays in the town's survival.
